branchCategory.name: PF3
branchCategory.description: <P>Series PF3W digital flow switch is perfect for applications requiring a constantly monitored flow of cooling or cleaning water. The PF3W series has been improved both in design and operating performance over the PF2W flow switch.  Depending on the selected model, the PF3W is up to 40% smaller in volume, offering improved piping space and flexibility.  Designed to work with fluids up to 90ºC, these switches incorporate a built-in temperature sensor so both flow and fluid temperature can be effectively monitored at the same time.  Further improvements include the addition of 2 screens, incorporating 3-color numerical displays which can also be rotated in both clockwise and counter-clockwise directions, thereby offering even better display visibility during operation.  Available as non-grease type and with analogue output if required, the PF3W meets IP 65 enclosure protection standards and is both RoHS and CE compliant. </P>

branchItem.name: PF3A7*H, Digital Flow Switch for Large Flow
branchItem.description: <p>Series PF3A digital flow switch provides continuous quantitative values as well as switched digital outputs when set flow levels are measured. The PF3A is suitable for applications requiring a metered quantity of air, such as for supply confirmation, filling accumulation, or fixed supply consumption. The oversized PF3A display has 2 screens, with main screen flow values in red or green, while the sub screen settings are shown in orange. The display can be rotated in 90 degree increments, thereby offering better visibility during operation. The thermal sensor is protected in a bypass flow path to reduce contact with moisture and contaminants, avoiding accuracy deterioration and damage.  The PF3A has an IP65 ingress protection rating and is both RoHS and CE compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: PF3W7-L, Digital Flow Sensor for Water, with IO-Link
PF3W7-Z, Digital Flow Switch for Water, with Integrated Display
branchItem.description: <p>Series PF3W7-Z digital flow sensor constantly monitors water or coolant flow.  All "Z" models have redesigned piping adapters, imparting a 13-53% weight reduction depending on flow range.  PF3W7 features an integrated 3-color, 2-screen display.  Options include a manual flow adjustment valve and temperature sensor.  The instantaneous flow value can be displayed on the main screen, while temperature can be monitored on the subscreen.  Change color from green to red or vice versa to indicate a flow set point has been reached. The white subscreen can also show the set point, accumulated or peak/bottom value, or a line name instead of the temperature.  The display rotates in both clockwise and counter-clockwise directions, offering improved readability during operation.  Switch and analog voltage or current signal outputs can be read over the M8 cable.  PF3W7-Z is IP65 rated, and is both RoHS and CE compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: PF3W7, Digital Flow Switch for Water, 3-Color Display, Integrated Display
branchItem.description: <P>Series PF3W digital flow switch is perfect for applications requiring a constantly monitored flow of cooling or cleaning water. The PF3W series has been improved both in design and operating performance over the PF2W flow switch.  Depending on the selected model, the PF3W is up to 40% smaller in volume, offering improved piping space and flexibility.  Designed to work with fluids up to 90ºC, these switches incorporate a built-in temperature sensor so both flow and fluid temperature can be effectively monitored at the same time.  Further improvements include the addition of 2 screens, incorporating 3-color numerical displays which can also be rotated in both clockwise and counter-clockwise directions, thereby offering even better display visibility during operation.  Available as non-grease type and with analogue output if required, the PF3W meets IP 65 enclosure protection standards and is both RoHS and CE compliant. </P>

branchItem.name: PF3W5, Digital Flow Switch for Water, Remote Sensor Type
branchItem.description: <P>Series PF3W digital flow switch is perfect for applications requiring a constantly monitored flow of cooling or cleaning water. The PF3W series has been improved both in design and operating performance over the PF2W flow switch.  Depending on the selected model, the PF3W is up to 40% smaller in volume, offering improved piping space and flexibility.  Designed to work with fluids up to 90ºC, these switches incorporate a built-in temperature sensor so both flow and fluid temperature can be effectively monitored at the same time.  Further improvements include the addition of 2 screens, incorporating 3-color numerical displays which can also be rotated in both clockwise and counter-clockwise directions, thereby offering even better display visibility during operation.  Available as non-grease type and with analogue output if required, the PF3W meets IP 65 enclosure protection standards and is both RoHS and CE compliant. </P>

branchItem.name: PF3W5-Z, Digital Flow Switch for Water, with Remote Sensor
branchItem.description: <p>Series PF3W5-Z digital flow sensor constantly monitors water or coolant flow.  All "Z" models have redesigned piping adapters, imparting a significant weight reduction and slimmer profile, depending on flow range.  PF3W5 is the remote version without a display.  The lower profile body can be deployed in tighter locations that may be out of an operator's view.  Two LEDs are visible on the control module to indicate power is supplied as well as several error conditions.  Switch and analog voltage or current signal outputs can be delivered to the HMI over the M8 cable.  Alternately, the PF3W3 panel mounted flow monitor is available for machines without an HMI.  PF3W5-Z is IP65 rated, and is both RoHS and CE compliant.</p>
